channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 澳大利亚妇女事务部长凯蒂-加拉格尔（Katy Gallagher）在澳大利亚政府公布性别薪酬差距数据时说："如果有三分之二的企业存在有利于男性的性别薪酬差距，那么这个国家就存在很大的问题。更多信息
item.description:
'There is a substantial problem in this country when you've got essentially two thirds of businesses with a gender pay gap in favour of men,' Minister for Women Katy Gallagher said, as the Australian government released data on gender pay gaps. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC2aey pic.twitter.com/8e9sj9JImz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 日本索尼公司将在其 PlayStation 部门裁员约 900 人，并关闭伦敦的一家工作室，因为视频游戏行业正努力从大流行后的低迷中复苏。更多信息
item.description:
Japan's Sony is cutting about 900 jobs at its PlayStation unit and shutting a studio in London as the video game industry struggles to recover from a post-pandemic slump. Read more: https://t.co/QM1vbF2Kr1 pic.twitter.com/sT7AAElBpn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: Earth Equity Advisors 公司的 Peter Krull 认为，利率已经达到顶峰，因此现在可能是关注 NextEra Energy Partners 等可再生能源开发商的 "大好时机"。
item.description:
Interest rates have peaked, so this may be a ‘pretty decent time’ to be looking at renewable energy developers like NextEra Energy Partners, according to Peter Krull of Earth Equity Advisors pic.twitter.com/pXaOYKXhqi

item.title: 观看：美国连锁超市克罗格（Kroger）收购规模较小的竞争对手阿尔伯森百货（Albertson's）的交易可能如履薄冰，因为美国联邦贸易委员会和八个州表示，他们将提起诉讼，阻止这项价值 246 亿美元的交易。
item.description:
WATCH: US supermarket chain Kroger’s deal to buy smaller rival Albertson’s may be on thin ice after the Federal Trade Commission and eight states said they are suing to block the $24.6 billion deal https://t.co/53b3jMvqtB pic.twitter.com/T3iQKxSyOl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：日本内务省的数据显示，日本 CPI 增长率为 2.0%，低于 12 月份 2.3% 的增长率。
item.description:
WATCH: The 2.0% gain in Japan's CPI was slower than the 2.3% increase in December, internal affairs and communications ministry data showed, underscoring views waning cost-push inflation from commodity imports could ease the pain of higher living costs https://t.co/U73xgwuel0 pic.twitter.com/1yj48uXZdk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：随着美国对加勒比海和欧洲游轮需求的增长以及成本的相对降低，挪威邮轮公司控股公司表示，预计第一季度将实现盈利。

item.title: 雷诺在日内瓦车展上发布了备受期待的新款电动汽车 R5，欧洲汽车业正争相降低成本，推出更多价格低廉、口碑良好的电动汽车，以应对中国廉价车型的到来。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Renault unveiled its highly anticipated new electric R5 at the Geneva Motor Show, as Europe's auto industry scrambled to cut costs and roll out more affordable, well-reviewed electric vehicles to counter the arrival of cheaper Chinese models. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/dNiiLPoazM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在比特币升至超过 57000 美元后，有迹象表明有大量玩家在购买这种加密货币，比特币也因此创下了两年来的新高。较小的竞争对手以太坊两年来首次突破 3,200 美元。更多信息
item.description:
Bitcoin hit a two-year high after it rose to more than $57,000 on signs of large players buying the cryptocurrency. Smaller rival ether topped $3,200 for the first time in two years. Read more: https://t.co/OEBvMnfTK4 pic.twitter.com/BHsyhzv17Q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尽管政府和企业多年来一直在评论缩小男女薪酬差距的问题，但官方数据揭示了澳大利亚一些最大雇主的男女收入差距。更多信息
item.description:
Official data exposes the gulf between what men and women earn at some of Australia's biggest employers, despite years of commentary from governments and corporations about closing the gender pay gap. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC1Cp0 pic.twitter.com/0lIi1aTAYr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024
